name: When You Put It That Way

system.description:
At 11th level, as an action you can suggest an activity (limited to a sentence or two) to a creature that can hear and understand you. A creature that canâ€™t be charmed is immune to this feature. The course of action must sound reasonable, as with the suggestion spell.

If the target fails a Wisdom saving throw , it pursues the course of action you described to the best of its ability for as long as you are present, and for up to 10 minutes after.

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
